ModMetaData.name: Not This One (Continued)
ModMetaData.author: busted_bunny
ModMetaData.description:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/buuPQel.png[/img] Update of busted_bunnys mod https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2615903428
[img]https://i.imgur.com/pufA0kM.png[/img]
[table] [tr][td][url=https://dsc.gg/mlie][img]https://i.imgur.com/zdzzBrc.png[/img][/url][/td] [td][url=https://github.com/emipa606/NotThisOne][img]https://i.imgur.com/kTkpTOE.png[/img][/url][/td] [/tr] [tr] [td][img]https://i.imgur.com/WjDSfUn.png[/img][/td] [td][img]https://i.imgur.com/Be8E2qJ.png[/img][/td] [/tr] [/table]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/Z4GOv8H.png[/img] [i]Yeah, you can slaughter them all. Except this one.[/i]
This mod adds a gizmo toggle on all tamed animals. Enabling it will remove possibility to slaughter this animal either by manual slaughter designation, or by auto-slaugther in animal tab.
[url=https://discord.gg/7befJWr9xS][img]https://i.imgur.com/cfoFEMA.png[/img][/url]
Credits: ZombieData - commisioned this mod and came up with idea.
For those who wish to contribute to my BioTech DLC purchase. [url=https://boosty.to/bustedbunny] [img]https://steamuserimages-a.akamaihd.net/ugc/1893226588885225061/74CC48E04ABA85EFEC132A71B213DF25A6411A23/?imw=5000&imh=5000&ima=fit&imcolor=%23000000&letterbox=false[/img] [/url]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/PwoNOj4.png[/img] [list] [*] See if the the error persists if you just have this mod and its requirements active. [*] If not, try adding your other mods until it happens again. [*] Post your error-log using [url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=818773962]HugsLib[/url] or the standalone [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2873415404]Uploader[/url] and command Ctrl+F12 [*] For best support, please use the Discord-channel for error-reporting. [*] Do not report errors by making a discussion-thread, I get no notification of that. [*] If you have the solution for a problem, please post it to the GitHub repository. [*] Use [url=https://github.com/RimSort/RimSort/releases/latest]RimSort[/url] to sort your mods [/list]
